name: Dr. Ramoura's Fin-tastic Dates
description:
Dr. Ramoura  is a love doctor with rather exclusive clientele. Help this remora's patients re-ignite the spark in their relationship with some sugar and spice! Cast the right kind of spell on your clients to make them whisper sweet or spicy sentiments to woo their date.

Made for Alakajam 5!

Tools
  • Unity
    • FMOD
  • Photoshop
Team
  • Del Nordlund
  • Phill Damaskin
